reference.title: Product Name Standard Document
reference.organization: Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center

entry.name: probability below lower limit
entry.description: probability of event below lower limit of two thresholds or below a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability above upper limit
entry.description: probability of event above upper limit of two thresholds or above a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for upper)

entry.name: probability between lower and upper limits lower included
entry.description: probability of event between upper and lower limits (range includes lower limit but not upper limit)

entry.name: probability above lower limit
entry.description: probability of event above lower limit of two thresholds or above a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability below upper limit
entry.description: probability of event below upper limit of two thresholds or less than a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for upper)

entry.name: reserved
entry.description: values to be set by WMO

entry.name: reserved for local use
entry.description: values to be set locally

entry.name: probability of existence
entry.description: probability of the existence of some phenomena (the values for upper and lower are not used), used when the actual threshold value(s) have little meaning outside of a model; an example would be white caps appearing on ocean waves.

entry.name: probability not equal to lower limit
entry.description: probability of event not being equal to lower limit of two thresholds or not equal to a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability not equal to upper limit
entry.description: probability of event not being equal to upper limit of two thresholds (whose value is in the octets marked for upper)

entry.name: probability equal to lower limit
entry.description: probability of event equal to lower limit of two thresholds or equal to a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability equal to upper limit
entry.description: probability of event equal to upper limit of two thresholds

entry.name: probability between upper and lower neither included
entry.description: probability of event between upper and lower limit, excluding the two limits

entry.name: probability greater than or equal to lower
entry.description: probability of event equal to or above lower limit of two thresholds or equal to or above a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability less than or equal to upper
entry.description: probability of event equal to or lower than upper limit of two thresholds or equal to or below a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for upper)

entry.name: probability less than or equal to lower
entry.description: probability of event equal to or below the lower limit of two thresholds or equal to or below a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for lower)

entry.name: probability greater than or equal to upper
entry.description: probability of event equal to or above upper limit of two thresholds or equal to or above a single threshold (whose value is in the octets marked for upper)

entry.name: probability between upper and lower upper included
entry.description: probability of event between upper and lower limits (range includes upper limit but not lower limit)

entry.name: probability between upper and lower both included
entry.description: probability of event between upper and lower limits (range includes both upper and lower limits)

entry.name: missing
entry.description: no value present
